synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvents: 4.0 g of DMF and 0.8 g of DI water
synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: InCl3 (65.4 mg, ~0.3 mmol), ZnCl2 (27.7 mg, ~0.2 mmol), terephthalic acid (H2bdc, 54.1 mg, 0.326 mmol), 1,2,4-triazole (21.9 mg, 0.317 mmol), concentrated hydrochloric acid (~130 mg)
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried under vacuum overnight, further dried by multi-step degas strategy for 10 hours each at 80 oC, 100 oC, 120 oC, 150 oC followed by 5 hours at 180 oC
